name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jarvis - Your Smart ChatGPT AI Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse Smarter with Jarvis ChatGPT AI Extension! Select content & Get Relevant Information, Summarize, Write Replies & Much more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Jarvis - Your Smart AI Assistant powered by ChatGPT that is going to revolutionize the way you interact with online content!

üöÄ GETTING STARTED
Launch Jarvis by using any of the following option:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Simply Select Any Online Text Content, which brings up the Jarvis custom menu to choose from.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Or, Press Ctrl+J to start chatting with Jarvis.

KEY BENEFITS
‚≠ê FREE access to the power of ChatGPT! 
‚≠ê Summarize selected articles and other long-form content.
‚≠ê Get More Information about any topic of interest.
‚≠ê Create replies to emails, social media posts, and anything else, saving you time and enhancing productivity.
‚≠ê Ask any question and get instant answers, making it really easy to find the information you need.

HOW JARVIS WORKS
  ‚û°Ô∏è Simply Select Any Online Content, which brings up the Jarvis custom menu.
  ‚û°Ô∏è Choose any Command from Menu (Summarize, Get More Info, Generate Reply, etc) 
  ‚û°Ô∏è Jarvis pops up with relevant answer. Continue to chat with Jarvis if needed.

FAQs
  ‚û°Ô∏è Is Jarvis Free?
  Yes! There is a free version of Jarvis.
  
  ‚û°Ô∏è Can I turn off Jarvis for selected websites?
  Absolutely! Just click the Jarvis extension from the Chrome extensions list and select the 'Disable Jarvis for this Website' checkbox setting.

üìß CONTACT US
Please feel free to contact us at contact@smartupai.com or https://jarvis.smartupai.com/ 

üôè THANK YOU! 
Jarvis is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive. Its seamless integration as a Chrome extension means you can effortlessly access its capabilities while you browse. Say goodbye to switching between tabs or opening additional apps. Jarvis becomes your trusted co-pilot, always ready to assist and enhance your online journey.

We believe that Jarvis has the potential to revolutionize the way people interact with the web, and we're eager for your help and feedback.

Thank you so much for your support!
